sentences.en: As for implanting chargers in the roadbed, that technology is "fascinating, and very expensive, " Smith says.

sentences.en: Climbing quickly down a steel ladder, he paused at the bottom, two feet above the roadbed flashing by.

sentences.en: Combined with and engineering practice , this paper discusses the total quality management of rock fill roadbed.

sentences.en: Compaction is a key index in controlling roadbed intensity and stability during the roadbed construction.

sentences.en: Engineering geological conditions are quite good, supporting the roadbed, bridges and culverts and other artificial structures.
sentences.cn: 工程地质条件较好, 对路基 、 桥涵及其它人工构造物较为有利.

sentences.en: He flopped to the sandy roadbed and twisted like an injured snake.
sentences.cn: 他扑倒在沙土路上像一条受了伤的蛇一般蜷缩成一团.

sentences.en: In the process of constructing high rank roadbed, mixture soil filling roadbed are generally adopted.
sentences.cn: 在山岭重丘区高等级公路路基修筑中, 普遍采用土石混合料填筑路堤.

sentences.en: It is mainly used in road, railway, airport and pier roadbed reinforcement.

sentences.en: The article analyses nature of lime, manganese iron, Aeolian soil, cement, and material requirement of roadbed.
